AboutPage.title: About ArduinoLab
AboutPage.subtitle: Empowering students to build, share, and learn together.
AboutPage.missionSubtitle: Building the Future, One Bot at a Time.
AboutPage.missionText: ArduinoLab was born from the volunteer efforts at PNL Mahdia with a singular goal: to ensure that the incredible robotics projects developed by school clubs are never lost. We believe documenting a project is as vital as building it. By creating this digital library, we are turning classroom experiments into a permanent, open-source legacy.
AboutPage.storySubtitle: From a Classroom Idea to a Global Reference.
AboutPage.storyText: Since 2024, we have collaborated with robotics clubs under the sponsorship of the SWAFY (Science With And For Youth) project. As we move through 2026, ArduinoLab stands as our enduring gift to the community—built by school kids, for school kids, to serve as a blueprint for the next generation of engineers.
AboutPage.joinSubtitle: Be Part of the ArduinoLab Legacy.
AboutPage.joinIndividualsText: Whether you are a club leader, a curious student, or a teacher, ArduinoLab is your stage. Join us in documenting the future and showcasing Tunisian youth creativity to the world.
AboutPage.joinPartnersText: Our journey with SWAFY has laid the foundation, but the future of STEM education requires sustained support. We invite visionary enterprises to sponsor ArduinoLab, helping us maintain this platform forever and expand its reach to every school in the nation.
